metadata.title: CVE-2021-46979 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iio: core: fix ioctl handlers removalCurrently ioctl handlers are removed twice. For the first time duringiio_device_unregister() then later on insideiio_device_unregister_eventset() and iio_buffers_free_sysfs_and_mask().Double free leads to kernel panic.Fix this by not touching ioctl handlers list directly but ratherletting code responsible for registration call the matching cleanuproutine itself.
